help-file.title: TROPHY
help-file.content:
Syntax: trophy
The trophy list is a feature which lets you gain a general idea of the amount of experience (relative to a particular mob) you are gaining or the mobs you kill. The trophy ensures that you do not gain experience by "sitting on mobs" as the more you kill any particular mob, the less experience you will gain for it. If you kill too many of any particular mob, you will eventually gain no experience at all for it.
The trophy list will help your decisions by letting you know how many of any particular mob you have already killed. If you are in a group, you will only gain a portion of that kill added to your trophy. Therefore, you will see percentages on your trophy list. Trophy entries will also change colors as the amount of experience you get for a kill becomes less and less.
